dcterms:creator: F. S. Leira
H. H. Helgesen
T. A. Johansen
T. I. Fossen
dcterms:description: The FLIR-ADAS dataset contains 9214 thermal and RGB image pairs, with objects annotated in MS-COCO format, including bounding boxes and class labels for three classes: car, person, and bicycle. Data is collected using the FLIR Tau2 camera, with images having a resolution of 640 × 512, and includes both day and night time data.
dcterms:title: FLIR-ADAS dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Hwang
J. Park
N. Kim
Y. Choi
I. So Kweon
dcterms:description: The KAIST Multi-Spectral dataset consists of 95000 image pairs of thermal and RGB images, with annotations available only for the person class. It is collected using the FLIR A35 camera, with images having a resolution of 340 × 256, and includes both day and night time images.
dcterms:title: KAIST Multi-Spectral dataset
